import { useState } from 'react' function App() { const [city, setCity] = useState('') const [weather, setWeather] = useState(null) const searchWeather = () => { console.log(city) const link = 'http://api.weatherapi.com/v1/current.json?key=' const key = '83eb9d090cf6483498a40555222001' const url = `${link}${key}&q=${city}&aqi=yes` fetch(url) .then(response => { console.log(response) if (response.status === 200) { return response.json() } }) .then(data => { console.log(data) setWeather(data) setCity('') }) } const handleCityChange = event => { setCity(event.target.value) } return ( <>
Weather

{weather.current.air_quality.co}

{weather.current.air_quality.pm10}

{weather.current.condition.text}

) : null}
) } export default App
